title: Edition 25 of Soccerway's weekly betting guide is out now
text:
Edition 25 of Soccerway's weekly betting guide is out now Getty 0 Mar 10, 2017 08:25:13 After another stellar performance including eight more winners, the best betting minds behind the site are aiming for another profitable weekend 
The Soccerway weekly betting guide is growing in popularity every week and it's easy to see why that is the case given an impressive record of turning a profit based solely on the statistics available on site and Opta's facts. 
Edition 25 promises another 17 picks from a variety of competitions including the Premier League, FA Cup, La Liga and more. The team scour the huge range of leagues covered by Soccerway to preview the weekend's action and provide selections looking at a number of different betting angles. 
The tools are available on site for all visitors but our team have used them to compile this publication, saving you some of the leg work in researching the upcoming matches. The advised wagers take into account head-to-head records, detailed recent form, goal time analysis and much more. 
The previous edition secured a profit to level stakes courtesy of eight winning picks, including successful tips at 9/4 (3.25) and 2/1 (3.0). 
As usual the majority of the highlighted angles are intended as single wagers but there's also the weekly five-fold which returns better than 10/1 (11.0) at the advised prices. Plus there's always the option of combining several of the fancies into your own multiple if you're chasing a bigger return from a smaller stake. 
The Opta spotlight has been turned on the FA Cup quarter finals, including Monday's blockbuster clash between Chelsea and Manchester United, so if you're struggling to find a bet on those games then why not see what the stats have to say. 
There are another three selections in Anytime Angles too, the column where the team identify in-form players around the world who are in fantastic scoring touch but still backable at tasty prices. Edition 25's trio are all priced at 13/8 (2.63) or bigger so should they find the net, then they promise plenty of profit at the advised odds. 
The guide is published every Friday and is free to all Soccerway members. Want to see what all the fuss is about? 
Simply register using the link provided , it’s quick, simple and free to do so and once completed you’ll be able to access the latest edition via the download link in your profile page. There’ll also be an email confirming the release of each new edition so that you can get your hands on it as soon as it’s available.
